title: Milk Tea
ingredients: Milk, Sugar, Water, Tea leaves
instructions:
Place water in your teapot and bring water to boil.
Turn heat off and pour in your tea leaves, cover and let it steep for 5 minutes.
Strain into tea cup, add milk and sugar to your liking.

title: Vegetable Pulao
ingredients: Basmati rice, Mixed vegetables (carrot, beans, peas), Onion, Ginger-garlic paste, Whole spices, Salt, Oil, Water
instructions:
Wash and soak rice for 20 minutes.
Sauté whole spices in oil, then add onions and ginger-garlic paste.
Add vegetables and cook briefly.
Add rice, water, and salt. Cook covered on low heat until rice is fluffy.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: Paneer, Tomatoes, Onions, Butter, Cream, Ginger-garlic paste, Garam masala, Chili powder, Salt
instructions:
Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add tomatoes and cook to a paste.
Blend and strain the mixture. Sauté again with butter, spices, and cream.
Add paneer and simmer for 5 minutes. Serve hot.

title: Masala Dosa
ingredients: Dosa batter, Boiled potatoes, Onions, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Turmeric, Oil, Salt
instructions:
Prepare potato masala by tempering spices and sautéing onions and mashed potatoes.
Spread dosa batter on hot tawa, add filling, cook till crispy.
Fold and serve.

title: Palak Paneer
ingredients: Spinach, Paneer, Onions, Tomatoes, Ginger-garlic, Green chili, Cumin, Cream, Salt
instructions:
Blanch and puree spinach. Sauté onions, garlic, and tomatoes with spices.
Add spinach puree and paneer cubes. Cook for 5–7 minutes. Finish with cream.

title: Upma
ingredients: Rava (semolina), Mustard seeds, Urad dal, Curry leaves, Green chili, Ginger, Onion, Water, Salt, Oil
instructions:
Roast rava until aromatic. Sauté mustard seeds, dal, curry leaves, and onions.
Add water and salt. Bring to boil and slowly add rava, stirring constantly until cooked.

title: Aloo Paratha
ingredients: Wheat flour, Boiled potatoes, Green chili, Coriander, Carom seeds, Salt, Ghee
instructions:
Make dough from flour and water. Mix mashed potatoes with spices.
Roll dough, stuff with filling, seal, and roll again.
Cook on tawa with ghee until golden.

title: Chole (Chickpea Curry)
ingredients: Boiled chickpeas, Onions, Tomatoes, Garlic, Ginger, Chole masala, Cumin, Oil, Salt
instructions:
Sauté cumin, onions, garlic, and ginger. Add tomatoes and cook to a paste.
Mix in spices and chickpeas. Simmer for 15–20 minutes. Garnish with coriander.

title: Lemon Rice
ingredients: Cooked rice, Mustard seeds, Urad dal, Green chili, Curry leaves, Turmeric, Lemon juice, Salt, Oil
instructions:
Heat oil, splutter mustard seeds, add dals, chili, curry leaves, turmeric.
Add rice and salt. Mix well. Finish with lemon juice and serve.

title: Pav Bhaji
ingredients: Mixed vegetables (potato, peas, carrot), Onion, Tomato, Pav bhaji masala, Butter, Pav buns, Lemon, Coriander
instructions:
Boil and mash veggies. Sauté onions and tomatoes, add spices, and mash everything together.
Add butter generously. Toast pav with butter. Serve with lemon and onions.

title: Tomato Soup
ingredients: Tomatoes, Onion, Garlic, Butter, Black pepper, Salt, Water
instructions:
Boil chopped tomatoes with onion and garlic until soft.
Blend the mixture and strain.
Simmer with butter, salt, and pepper. Serve hot.

title: Egg Curry
ingredients: Boiled eggs, Onion, Tomato, Ginger-garlic paste, Spices, Oil, Salt
instructions:
Sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste, add tomatoes and spices.
Add water and bring to a boil. Add boiled eggs and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Fish Fry
ingredients: Fish fillets, Chili powder, Turmeric, Lemon juice, Salt, Oil
instructions:
Marinate fish with spices and lemon juice. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
Shallow fry both sides until golden brown.

title: Garlic Naan
ingredients: All-purpose flour, Yogurt, Yeast, Garlic, Butter, Salt
instructions:
Knead dough and allow to rise. Roll into naans and sprinkle garlic.
Cook on tawa or oven until puffed. Brush with butter and serve.

title: Curd Rice
ingredients: Cooked rice, Curd, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Green chili, Ginger, Salt
instructions:
Mix rice with curd and salt. Temper mustard seeds, curry leaves, and chili.
Add to rice and mix well. Serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: Bhindi Fry
ingredients: Okra (bhindi), Onion, Spices, Oil, Salt
instructions:
Slice bhindi and sauté in oil. Add onions and spices.
Cook until soft and slightly crispy.

title: Egg Biryani
ingredients: Boiled eggs, Basmati rice, Onion, Tomato, Spices, Curd, Mint, Oil
instructions:
Sauté onions and spices, add curd and tomatoes. Add boiled eggs.
Layer cooked rice, add mint, and cook on low heat for 10 minutes.

title: Kadai Paneer
ingredients: Paneer, Capsicum, Onion, Tomato, Kadai masala, Oil, Salt
instructions:
Sauté onions and capsicum, add tomato puree and kadai masala.
Add paneer cubes, cook until flavors combine.

title: Rava Kesari
ingredients: Rava (semolina), Ghee, Sugar, Water, Cashews, Cardamom
instructions:
Roast rava in ghee. Boil water with sugar, add roasted rava.
Cook while stirring. Add cashews and cardamom.

title: Vegetable Cutlet
ingredients: Boiled vegetables, Bread crumbs, Spices, Oil, Salt
instructions:
Mash vegetables with spices. Shape into cutlets, coat with bread crumbs.
Shallow fry until golden brown.

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: Chicken, Onion, Tomato, Ginger-garlic paste, Spices, Oil, Salt
instructions:
Sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste, add tomatoes and spices.
Add chicken and cook until tender with some water.

title: Gobi Manchurian
ingredients: Cauliflower, Cornflour, Soy sauce, Garlic, Chili sauce, Onion, Oil, Salt
instructions: Fry cauliflower florets coated in cornflour. Stir-fry with sauces, garlic, and onions.

title: Besan Chilla
ingredients: Besan (gram flour), Onion, Green chili, Spices, Water, Oil
instructions:
Mix besan with water and spices. Add chopped onions and chilies.
Cook on tawa like pancakes until golden brown.

title: Fruit Salad
ingredients: Mixed fruits, Honey, Lemon juice, Mint leaves
instructions:
Chop fruits evenly. Drizzle with honey and lemon juice.
Toss well and garnish with mint.

title: Poha
ingredients: Flattened rice (poha), Onion, Potato, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Turmeric, Salt, Lemon
instructions:
Soak poha briefly and drain. Temper spices, sauté onion and potato.
Add poha, turmeric, and salt. Cook and finish with lemon juice.

title: Dhokla
ingredients: Besan, Yogurt, Eno (fruit salt), Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Green chili
instructions:
Make a batter with besan and yogurt. Add Eno before steaming.
Steam 15-20 minutes. Temper mustard seeds and pour on top.

title: Rasam
ingredients: Tamarind, Tomato, Garlic, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Rasam powder, Water, Salt
instructions:
Boil tamarind water with spices, tomato, and rasam powder.
Add tempering of mustard seeds and curry leaves. Serve hot.

title: Paneer Tikka
ingredients: Paneer, Curd, Spices, Bell peppers, Onion, Oil
instructions:
Marinate paneer and veggies in spiced curd.
Grill or bake until charred. Serve with mint chutney.

title: Sooji Halwa
ingredients: Rava, Ghee, Sugar, Water, Cashews, Cardamom
instructions:
Roast rava in ghee. Boil water with sugar.
Add to rava and cook, stirring. Add cardamom and cashews.

title: Aloo Gobi
ingredients: Potato, Cauliflower, Onion, Tomato, Spices, Oil, Salt
instructions:
Sauté onions, add spices, tomatoes, potatoes, and cauliflower.
Cook covered until vegetables are tender.

title: Methi Thepla
ingredients: Whole wheat flour, Fenugreek leaves, Spices, Yogurt, Oil, Salt
instructions:
Knead dough with fenugreek and spices. Roll into thin flatbreads.
Cook on tawa with oil until golden.

title: Pongal
ingredients: Rice, Moong dal, Ginger, Black pepper, Cumin seeds, Ghee, Cashews, Salt
instructions:
Roast moong dal, cook with rice and water until soft.
Temper with ginger, pepper, cumin, and cashews in ghee. Mix well and serve hot.
